Summary: ufo hovered over my sisters house
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Grand Forks
There were no other sightings in Grand Forks on or around July 20th 2007
divs: Sighting Detailsi did not see this personally but it was witnessed simultaniously by my sister and her neighbor boy.... i should give you a little background... it seems like for years there has been some type of ufo experiences involving my sister ever since she was a young girl... she is in her mid 50's now.... when i was younger, about 8 or 9 years old, i moved into her room just after she moved out of the house... not long after that i was awoken by a whirring sound and lights in my window overlooking our back yard.... i thought it was kinda strange because it was like 3 or 4 in the morning... anyway i thought it was a street sweeper driving through our alley.... but when i got up to take a peek, i was shocked and terrified to see that whatever it was it was in our back yard, which was impossible because we had a full 6 foot high wooden fence around our yard. thats all i could take, i was so scared i jumped back in bed and got under the covers... thats all i remember.... anyway, that was just one event that i am aware of that seemed to be some connection between my sister and mysterious ufo phenomenon.... ok now to get on to this latest sighting.... my sister told me i guess it was about mid July, that one night they (her and her husband)were awakened by something strange happening outside their house... thats when they said they witnessed this ufo hovering above their house.... i can't remember a lot of the details as it was a few months ago she told me this story, but the strange thing about the story is that the next day they questioned what they had seen and thought maybe it was a dream, but then the next door neighbor kid came over and said, "Jackie, Jackie, i saw a UFO over your house last night, and then he drew a picture of it, and it was exactly the same thing they had seen.... anyway that is a rough reccolection of what she told me, but if you would like maybe i can have her talk to someone from your group.... i am not a real beleiver in this kind of stuff, or should i say more specifically i beleive there is something out there, but i am a Christian of strong faith and am not too concerned one way or another about ufo phenomenon... but i beleive we are being visited for some reason, good or bad.... also it is possible that my sister has some kind of implant in her leg, because some years ago she mentioned something about that to me .... anyway, some of what i mentioned here may be a bit off but to the best of my knowledge it is roughly accurate.... thanks for your kind ear and God bless.... marty
